name: Alien Shooter (itch) (newnez)
description:
Fight against the alien invasion! Stop the intruders as they try to destroy Earth. Play as General Fi Ter as you; blow up alien ships, gain power ups (future release), destroy bosses (more bosses to come), and gain the highest score!

Credits:
  • Game Engine: Game Maker Studio 2
  • Sounds: All custom
  • Programming: Nez
